name: Rescuties! VR
description: Rescuties VR will have you dashing around your living room catching babies and tossing them into rescue vehicles in your mission to save the day. Put on that headset, pick up those controllers and get rescuinâ€™... in Rescuties VR!

reviews.review_text: Quite a few levels and gameplay modes, pretty fun gameplay... didnt seem very challenging though... Maybe the later levels would be... This game is fun to play but on my system didnt run that good... AMD 8350 + GTX 960sli... - causing fairly low frame rate, and inconsistant throwing physics.  Be sure you meet the system requirements or game may not perform properly...
